reqs:
Pre-reqs: (3rd year standing or higher.)
Debating Topics in Food, Nutrition and Health
Using formal debate and seminar presentations to research current topics in Food, Nutrition and Health. Topics will be determined in class and vary from year to year.
Prerequisites: FNH 350 and 351
Topic: Maternal and Fetal Nutrition
Examination of nutrition during pregnancy, with a focus on metabolic adaptations, macro-and micro-nutrient requirements, and special issues during pregnancy that may influence the maternal-fetal nutritional supply.
courseName: Advanced Topics in Food, Nutrition, and Health
description: Analysis and interpretation of current issues in food, nutrition and health.
